participant_1.background:

My weight is not relevant to my job or my training as a welder.

participant_2.background:
My family is close because we like the same things, like Disney movies.
i work as a waitress.
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
i have entered into many violin competitions before and have placed in a few of them.
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.

content.text: Hey, what's your favorite Disney movie?
I love Tangled, it's the best! What about you?
Mine is Frozen, but I also love Beauty and the Beast.
Those are both great, too! I've seen them a million times.
Me too! I used to watch them all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! I also used to play dress up as the characters.
That's so cool! I used to love to do that too.
I still do sometimes! My husband and I love to cosplay together.
That's so cute! What do you guys usually cosplay as?
We've done a lot of different things, but our favorite is probably when we did Belle and Beast.
That's awesome! I bet you guys look great together.
Well you definitely look like you're having fun!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about Disney movies.
